text: Any plan to add separate instance of global modules to child themes? So you dont have to clone it and override it in the child theme
<@UATE4ATHP> or maybe add a `meta.json` file that lists out which modules should be included?
I have a similar problem where I want to show some global modules in a child theme but not all. A json file that includes which modules are inherited would be better than the override method
I guess a possible implementation of your idea
Hey Radu - thanks for the patience here. I just pushed a fix that should resolve this issue. Can you let me know if you continue to experience this?
Is it possible to clone modules to a child theme? I can clone and change all the other files except modules.
Hey Mitchell - yes, it works now, but the screenshots are missing on both parent and child.
Screenshots appear for Saved sections though
